defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: Safety buffer for autocomplete, commas placed automagically.

defaultSnippets.label:
"", 
" "
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: Inserts a new line with a string that you can tab to.
Adds a new string that you can tab to.

defaultSnippets.label: SetChoice
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/EventOnly/Choice.html#setchoice)**. Choices not yet set are blank strings.

defaultSnippets.label: IfChoice
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/EventOnly/Choice.html#ifchoice)**. Choices not yet set are blank strings.

defaultSnippets.label: AdventureComplete
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/EventOnly/Complete.html#adventurecomplete)**. Applies to any Location that has the Adventure.

defaultSnippets.label: Menu
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/EventOnly/Menu.html#menu-system)**. If more than 6 choices, page arrows will be added.

defaultSnippets.label: MaxMenuSlots -- Menu
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: *Sub-function*. **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/EventOnly/Menu.html#maxmenuslots)**. Maximum of 6, minimum of 1. FinalOption does not count.

defaultSnippets.label: FinalOption -- Menu
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: *Sub-function*. **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/EventOnly/Menu.html#finaloption)**. Does not count towards MaxMenuSlots, at bottom of every page.

defaultSnippets.label: DisplayCharacters
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/EventOnly/SpeakersSpecific.html#displaycharacters)**. Can use nameID of monster, but still must be in `Speakers`

defaultSnippets.label: StatCheck + ChangeStatCheckDifficulty(s)
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/EventOnly/StatCheck.html?#changestatcheckdifficulty)**. Use Tab + Space to force autocomplete options.

defaultSnippets.label: StatCheckRollUnder
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/EventOnly/StatCheck.html?#statcheckrollunder)**. Can't use any sub-functions or related functions.

defaultSnippets.label: RefocusOnInitialMonster
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/CombatOnly/MonsterFocus.html#refocusoninitialmonster)**. Will not work if you used `ShuffleMonsterEncounter`

defaultSnippets.label: HitPlayerWith
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/CombatOnly/PlayerCombatAfflictions.html#hitplayerwith)**. Do not use any skill with a targetType that isn't `single`

defaultSnippets.label: SkipPlayerAttack
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/CombatOnly/PlayerCombatAfflictions.html#skipplayerattack)**. Prevents the player from consuming the skill costType, and using consumables.

defaultSnippets.label: IfOtherMonsterHasStance
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/CombatOnly/Stances.html#ifothermonsterhasstance-and-ifothermonsterdoesnthavestance)**. Will shift focus to the given monster.

defaultSnippets.label: IfOtherMonsterDoesntHaveStance
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/CombatOnly/Stances.html#ifothermonsterhasstance-and-ifothermonsterdoesnthavestance)**. Will shift focus to the given monster.

defaultSnippets.label: ChangeMonsterLevel
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#changemonster-functions)**. Can take negative values. Resets upon leaving event and/or encounter. Does not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.label: ChangeMonsterErosDrop
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#changemonster-functions)**. Can take negative values. Resets upon leaving event and/or encounter. Does not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.label: LevelUpMonster Number
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html?highlight=LevelUpMonster#levelupmonster)**. Can take negative values. Resets upon leaving event and/or encounter. Does not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html?highlight=LevelUpMonster#levelupmonster)**. Resets upon leaving event and/or encounter. Does not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#changemonstersensitivity)**. Can take negative values. Resets upon leaving event and/or encounter. Does not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.label: ChangeMonsterStatusEffectResistances
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#changemonsterstatuseffectresistances)**. Can take negative values. Resets upon leaving event and/or encounter. Does not produce dialogue. Positive values improve resistance, negative values decrease.

defaultSnippets.label: ChangeMonsterFetish
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#changemonsterfetish)**. Can take negative values. Resets upon leaving event and/or encounter. Does not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#giveperktomonster-removeperkfrommonster)**. Resets upon leaving the event and/or encounter. These do not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#clearmonsterperks-clearmonsterskilllist)**. Resets upon leaving the event and/or encounter. These do not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.label: RecalculateMonsterExpDrop
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#recalculatemonsterexpdrop)**. Resets upon leaving the event and/or encounter. These do not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.label: RecalculateMonsterExpDrop + AlterByPercent
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#recalculatemonsterexpdrop)**. Resets upon leaving the event and/or encounter. These do not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/ChangeMonster.html#recalculatemonstererosdrop)**. Resets upon leaving the event and/or encounter. These do not produce dialogue.

defaultSnippets.label: JumpToEvent
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/EventJumps.html)**. Picks the first scene listed by default.

defaultSnippets.label: SetSpirit
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/PlayerAfflictions.html#setspirit)**. Rounds to the players maximum or 0 if the number is out of bounds.

defaultSnippets.label: GiveExp
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/PlayerGiveAndTake.html#giveexp)**. Ignores Exp modifiers from perks. Can be negative.

defaultSnippets.label: SwapLineIf HasFetish
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/SwapLineIf.html#hasfetish)**. Can use blank String for False after checking for a Fetish.

defaultSnippets.label: SwapLineIf Perk
defaultSnippets.markdownDescription: **[Documentation](https://mgd-modding-docs.readthedocs.io/Doc/Reference/General/SwapLineIf.html#perk)**. Can use blank String for False after checking for a Perk.
